analysis.description:
Lottery.pay (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#1290-1309) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(ante * required_number_players - ante * required_number_players * winner_percentage / 100) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#1303-1304)

Reentrancy in Lottery.buy (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#1268-1290):
	External calls:
	- update() (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#1290)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - ante - oracle_price) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#1280-1281)
	- update() (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#1290)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- player_count (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#1290)
usingOraclize.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#546-549) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in usingOraclize.oraclizeAPI (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#72-81):
	External calls:
	- address(oraclize) != OAR.getAddress() (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#76-81)
	- oraclize = OraclizeI(OAR.getAddress()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#80-81)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oraclize (/unique_chucks/30/0xc7eae23c737b5c53ea661a2110e6c60402036445.sol#80-81)
